&= \overrightarrow{P} \cdot \overrightarrow{P} - 2 \overrightarrow{A} \cdot \overrightarrow{P} + \overrightarrow{A} \cdot \overrightarrow{A} \\
&= R^2 - 2 \overrightarrow{A} \cdot \overrightarrow{P} + R^2 \\
&= 2R^2 - 2 \overrightarrow{A} \cdot \overrightarrow{P}.
\end{align*}Similarly,
\begin{align*}
PB^2 &= 2R^2 - 2 \overrightarrow{B} \cdot \overrightarrow{P}, \\
PC^2 &= 2R^2 - 2 \overrightarrow{C} \cdot \overrightarrow{P},
\end{align*}and
\begin{align*}PH^2 &= \|\overrightarrow{P} - \overrightarrow{H}\|^2 \\
&= \|\overrightarrow{P} - \overrightarrow{A} - \overrightarrow{B} - \overrightarrow{C}\|^2 \\
&= \overrightarrow{A} \cdot \overrightarrow{A} + \overrightarrow{B} \cdot \overrightarrow{B} + \overrightarrow{C} \cdot \overrightarrow{C} + \overrightarrow{P} \cdot \overrightarrow{P} \\

&= R^2 + R^2 + R^2 + R^2 \\
&\quad + 2 \left( R^2 - \frac{a^2}{2} \right) + 2 \left( R^2 - \frac{b^2}{2} \right) + 2 \left( R^2 - \frac{c^2}{2} \right) - 2 \overrightarrow{A} \cdot \overrightarrow{P} - 2 \overrightarrow{B} \cdot \overrightarrow{P} - 2 \overrightarrow{C} \cdot \overrightarrow{P} \\
&= 10R^2 - a^2 - b^2 - c^2 - 2 \overrightarrow{A} \cdot \overrightarrow{P} - 2 \overrightarrow{B} \cdot \overrightarrow{P} - 2 \overrightarrow{C} \cdot \overrightarrow{P}.
\end{align*}Thus,
\[PA^2 + PB^2 + PC^2 - PH^2 = \boxed{a^2 + b^2 + c^2 - 4R^2}.\]

\end{align*}Thus, $a + b + c = 0,$ or $a + b = -c,$ $b + c = -a,$ and $c + a = -b.$  Then
\begin{align*}
a^2 + b^2 + c^2 - ab - ac - bc &= (a + b + c)^2 - 3(ab + ac + bc) \\
&= -3(ab + ac + bc).
\end{align*}Hence,
\[\frac{a}{b + c} + \frac{b}{a + c} + \frac{c}{a + b} = \frac{a^2(b + c) + b^2(a + c) + c^2(a + b)}{(a + b)(b + c)(c + a)} = \boxed{0}.\]

Solution:
The matrix is not invertible if and only if its determinant is 0.  This determinant is
\begin{align*}
\begin{vmatrix} a & b & c \\ b & c & a \\ c & a & b \end{vmatrix} &= a \begin{vmatrix} c & a \\ a & b \end{vmatrix} - b \begin{vmatrix} b & c \\ c & a \end{vmatrix} + c \begin{vmatrix} b & c \\ c & a \end{vmatrix} \\
&= a(b - ac) - b(c - bc) + c(b - ac) \\
&= 2abc - a^2 c - b^2 a - c^2 b.
\end{align*}Thus, we want to find all possible values of
\[\frac{a}{b + c} + \frac{b}{a + c} + \frac{c}{a + b} = \frac{a^2}{a(b + c)} + \frac{b^2}{b(a + c)} + \frac{c^2}{c(a + b)}.\]By Cauchy-Schwarz,
\[\left( \frac{a^2}{a(b + c)} + \frac{b^2}{b(a + c)} + \frac{c^2}{c(a + b)} \right) (a(b + c) + b(a + c) + c(a + b)) \ge (a + b + c)^2.\]Since $a + b + c \neq 0,$ we can divide both sides by $a + b + c,$ to get
\[\frac{a^2}{b + c} + \frac{b^2}{a + c} + \frac{c^2}{a + b} \ge a + b + c.\]Then
\begin{align*}
\frac{a^2}{b + c} + \frac{b^2}{a + c} + \frac{c^2}{a + b} - (a + b + c) &= \frac{a^2 - a(b + c) + b^2 - b(a + c) + c^2 - c(a + b)}{b + c + a} \\
&= \frac{(b - c)^2 + (c - a)^2 + (a - b)^2}{2(a + b + c)},
\end{align*}so
\[\frac{a^2}{b + c} + \frac{b^2}{a + c} + \frac{c^2}{a + b} \ge a + b + c.\]Equality occurs when $a = b = c,$ so the set of all possible values of $\frac{a}{b + c} + \frac{b}{a + c} + \frac{c}{a + b}$ is $\boxed{[3,\infty)}.$

We can expand the expression as follows:
\begin{align*}
\frac{a}{b + c} + \frac{b}{a + c} + \frac{c}{a + b} &= \frac{a^2(a+b+c) + b^2(a+b+c) + c^2(a+b+c)}{(a+b)(b+c)(c+a)} \\
&= \frac{(a^3+b^3+c^3+3abc)+(a^2b+b^2a+a^2c+c^2a+b^2c+c^2b)}{(a+b)(b+c)(c+a)} \\
&= \frac{(a+b+c)(a^2+b^2+c^2-ab-bc-ca)+(a+b+c)(ab+bc+ca-3abc)}{(a+b)(b+c)(c+a)} \\
&= \frac{(a+b+c)(a^2+b^2+c^2+2ab+2bc+2ca)}{(a+b)(b+c)(c+a)} \\
&= \frac{(a+b+c)(a+b)(b+c)(c+a)}{(a+b)(b+c)(c+a)} \\
&= \boxed{a+b+c}.
\end{align*}Thus, the expression is equal to $a+b+c$ for all values of $a,$ $b,$ and $c$ such that the matrix
\[\begin{pmatrix} a & b & c \\ b & c & a \\ c & a & b \end{pmatrix}\]is not invertible.

Since the matrix is not invertible, its determinant is 0.  This gives us the equation
\[a^3 + b^3 + c^3 - 3abc = 0.\]Then
\begin{align*}
\frac{a}{b + c} + \frac{b}{a + c} + \frac{c}{a + b} &= \frac{a^2}{ab + ac} + \frac{b^2}{ab + bc} + \frac{c^2}{ac + bc} \\
&= \frac{a^3 + b^3 + c^3 + 3abc}{abc + ab^2 + ac^2 + b^2 c + abc + ac^2 + abc + ab^2} \\
&= \frac{a^3 + b^3 + c^3 + 3abc}{2abc + a^2 b + a^2 c + b^2 a + b^2 c + c^2 a + c^2 b} \\
&= \frac{3abc}{2abc + a^2 b + a^2 c + b^2 a + b^2 c + c^2 a + c^2 b} \\
&= \frac{3}{\frac{2}{a} + \frac{2}{b} + \frac{2}{c} + \frac{b}{a^2} + \frac{c}{a^2} + \frac{a}{b^2} + \frac{c}{b^2} + \frac{a}{c^2} + \frac{b}{c^2}}.
\end{align*}By AM-GM,
\[\frac{2}{a} + \frac{b}{a^2} + \frac{c}{a^2} \ge 3 \sqrt[3]{\frac{2b}{a^3}} = 3 \sqrt[3]{\frac{2}{a}}.\]Similarly,
\begin{align*}
\frac{2}{b} + \frac{a}{b^2} + \frac{c}{b^2} &\ge 3 \sqrt[3]{\frac{2a}{b^3}} = 3 \sqrt[3]{\frac{2}{b}}, \\
\frac{2}{c} + \frac{a}{c^2} + \frac{b}{c^2} &\ge 3 \sqrt[3]{\frac{2a}{c^3}} = 3 \sqrt[3]{\frac{2}{c}}.
\end{align*}Therefore,
\[\frac{2}{a} + \frac{2}{b} + \frac{2}{c} + \frac{b}{a^2} + \frac{c}{a^2} + \frac{a}{b^2} + \frac{c}{b^2} + \frac{a}{c^2} + \frac{b}{c^2} \ge 3 \sqrt[3]{8} + 3 \sqrt[3]{\frac{2}{a}} + 3 \sqrt[3]{\frac{2}{b}} + 3 \sqrt[3]{\frac{2}{c}}.\]Hence,
\[\frac{3}{\frac{2}{a} + \frac{2}{b} + \frac{2}{c} + \frac{b}{a^2} + \frac{c}{a^2} + \frac{a}{b^2} + \frac{c}{b^2} + \frac{a}{c^2} + \frac{b}{c^2}} \le \frac{1}{\sqrt[3]{8}} = \frac{\sqrt[3]{4}}{2}.\]Equality occurs when $a = b = c,$ so the possible values of $\frac{a}{b + c} + \frac{b}{a + c} + \frac{c}{a + b}$ are $\boxed{\left[ \frac{3 \sqrt[3]{4}}{2}, \infty \right)}.$

Note that
\begin{align*}
\frac{a}{b + c} + \frac{b}{a + c} + \frac{c}{a + b} &= \frac{a^2}{a(b + c)} + \frac{b^2}{b(a + c)} + \frac{c^2}{c(a + b)} \\
&= \frac{a^2}{ab + ac} + \frac{b^2}{ba + bc} + \frac{c^2}{ca + cb}.
\end{align*}Suppose that the matrix $\begin{pmatrix} a & b & c \\ b & c & a \\ c & a & b \end{pmatrix}$ is not invertible.  Then its determinant is 0:
\begin{align*}
\begin{vmatrix} a & b & c \\ b & c & a \\ c & a & b \end{vmatrix} &= a \begin{vmatrix} c & a \\ a & b \end{vmatrix} - b \begin{vmatrix} b & a \\ c & b \end{vmatrix} + c \begin{vmatrix} b & c \\ c & a \end{vmatrix} \\
&= a(b - ac) - b(ab - ac) + c(ab - c^2) \\
&= a^2 c - abc - ab^2 + abc + ac^2 - bc^2 \\
&= a^2 c - ab^2 - bc^2 + ac^2 \\
&= (a - b)(a - c)(b - c) = 0.
\end{align*}Hence, $a = b,$ $a = c,$ or $b = c.$

If $a = b,$ then the expression becomes
\[\frac{a}{c + a} + \frac{a}{a + c} + \frac{c}{a + a} = \frac{2a + c}{2a + c} + \frac{c}{2a + c} = 2.\]If $a = c,$ then the expression becomes
\[\frac{a}{b + a} + \frac{a}{a + b} + \frac{b}{a + a} = \frac{2a + b}{2a + b} + \frac{b}{2a + b} = 2.\]If $b = c,$ then the expression becomes
\[\frac{a}{b + c} + \frac{b}{a + c} + \frac{b}{a + b} = \frac{a}{a + b} + \frac{b}{a + b} + 1 = 2.\]Therefore, the possible values are $\boxed{2}.$

Solution:
If the matrix
\[\begin{pmatrix} a & b & c \\ b & c & a \\ c & a & b \end{pmatrix}\]is not invertible, then its determinant is 0.  This determinant is equal to
\begin{align*}
&a \cdot c \cdot b + b \cdot a \cdot c + c \cdot b \cdot a - c \cdot b \cdot c - a \cdot c \cdot a - b \cdot a \cdot b \\
&= a^2 b + b^2 c + c^2 a - ac^2 - ba^2 - cb^2.
\end{align*}Hence,
\begin{align*}
0 &= a^2 b + b^2 c + c^2 a - ac^2 - ba^2 - cb^2 \\
&= (a + b + c)(ab + bc + ca) - 3abc \\
&= (a + b + c)(ab + bc + ca - 3abc/(a + b + c)).
\end{align*}Hence, $a + b + c = 0$ or $ab + bc + ca = 3abc/(a + b + c).$

If $a + b + c = 0,$ then
\[\frac{a}{b + c} + \frac{b}{a + c} + \frac{c}{a + b} = \frac{a}{-a} + \frac{b}{-b} + \frac{c}{-c} = \boxed{-3}.\]Otherwise, $ab + bc + ca = 3abc/(a + b + c),$ so
\[\frac{a}{b + c} + \frac{b}{a + c} + \frac{c}{a + b} = \frac{a^2}{ab + ac} + \frac{b^2}{ab + bc} + \frac{c^2}{ac + bc}.\]By Cauchy-Schwarz,
\[(a^2 + b^2 + c^2) \left( \frac{a^2}{ab + ac} + \frac{b^2}{ab + bc} + \frac{c^2}{ac + bc} \right) \ge (a + b + c)^2 = 0.\]Since $a + b + c \neq 0,$ $a^2 + b^2 + c^2 \neq 0,$ so
\[\frac{a^2}{ab + ac} + \frac{b^2}{ab + bc} + \frac{c^2}{ac + bc} \ge 0.\]Hence, $\frac{a}{b + c} + \frac{b}{a + c} + \frac{c}{a + b} \ge 0.$

Furthermore, if $a,$ $b,$ $c$ are all positive, then by AM-GM,
\[\frac{a}{b + c} + \frac{b}{a + c} + \frac{c}{a + b} \ge 3 \sqrt[3]{\frac{abc}{(a + b)(b + c)(c + a)}} > 0.\]Therefore, if $a,$ $b,$ $c$ are all positive, then
\[\frac{a}{b + c} + \frac{b}{a + c} + \frac{c}{a + b} > 0.\]Thus, the possible values of $\frac{a}{b + c} + \frac{b}{a + c} + \frac{c}{a + b}$ are $\boxed{-3}$ and all nonnegative numbers.
